Deck¶

class vox_cards.deck.Deck(hands=1, jokers=False)¶

A class allowing the control of hands, and storing the cards used.

Parameters

  • hands (int) – The number of hands to construct the deck with.

  • jokers (bool) – Whether or not to construct the deck with 2 additional joker cards.

Returns

Returns a Deck object that is iterable.

Return type

Deck

cards: list

The full list of Card objects that Hand objects draw from.

hands: list

A list of Hand objects that belong to this deck and can draw from it.

drawn_cards: list

A list of Card objects that have already been removed from self.cards by either dealing to self.hands or having hands draw from this deck. Typically, unless influenced, all cards found in this list will always also be in a Hand

discarded_cards: list

A list of Card objects that have been discarded via the hand.discard method.

is_shuffled: bool

Denotes whether or not the deck has been shuffled via the Deck.shuffle method.

deal(amount=7)¶

Deals [amount] cards to all hands.

Parameters

amount (int (, optional)) – Amount of Card objects to deal to hands, defaults to 7

shuffle(new_deck=False)¶

Shuffle the deck in place.

Parameters

new_deck – Whether or nor to reset the deck back to it’s original state,

removing all cards from Hand objects in hands, and setting drawn_cards and Deck.discarded_cards to empty lists. :type new_deck: bool (, optional)
